Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Egg = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local myCharacter local myHumanoid local numberOfEggs local screenGui local buzzer
local eggCFrame = CFrame.new(10.0158854, 11.9400072, 0.32186985, 0.0164276138, -0.99986428, 0, 0, 0, 1, -0.99986428, -0.0164276138, 0)
local summoner
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end numberOfEggs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEggs") if numberOfEggs then if numberOfEggs.Value <= 0 then buzzer = Tool:FindFirstChild("NoEggsBuzzer") if buzzer then buzzer:Play() end return end end numberOfEggs.Value = numberOfEggs.Value - 1 myCharacter = Tool.Parent local myTorso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end local myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) if not myPlayer then return end print(myHumanoid) if myHumanoid == nil then return end Tool.Enabled = false local clonedEgg = Egg:Clone()
clonedEgg.Transparency = 0.2
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = ((target - Egg.Position).unit + Vector3.new(0, 0.25, 0)).unit
clonedEgg.Velocity = direction * 25.0
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.Parent = clonedEgg float.force = Vector3.new(0, clonedEgg:GetMass() * 190, 0)
bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.P = 10000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P) bodyGyro.cframe = eggCFrame bodyGyro.Parent = clonedEgg
clonedEgg.Parent = Workspace clonedEgg.CanCollide = true Egg.Transparency = 1.0
local cloneScript = Tool.SummonScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = clonedEgg
summoner = cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Summoner") if summoner then summoner.Value = myCharacter end
cloneScript.Disabled = false
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = myPlayer creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = clonedEgg
wait(4.0) Egg.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() myCharacter = Tool.Parent myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") numberOfEggs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEggs")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "TrapsGui" if myPlayer then screenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "TrapContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Egg" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=69464626" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") if numberOfEggs then text.Text = numberOfEggs.Value end
numberOfEggs.Changed:connect(function() text.Text = numberOfEggs.Value end) text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") text.FontSize = 7 end
function onUnequipped() Egg.Transparency = 0.0 if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

wait()
local Egg = script.Parent
while script:FindFirstChild("Summoner") == nil do wait() end
local summoner = script.Summoner summoner = script.Summoner.Value
if summoner == nil then script:Remove() end
local targetEnemyTorso = nil local targetEnemyHumanoid = nil
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14)
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local alien = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(69489068) if alien then alien = alien:GetChildren()[1] end
if alien == nil then Egg:Remove() end
local alienHumanoid = alien:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local alienTorso = alien:FindFirstChild("Torso")
while alienHumanoid.Health < 200 do alienHumanoid.Health = 200 wait() end
debris:AddItem(alien, 21)
while targetEnemyTorso == nil do local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(Egg.Position - checkAOE, Egg.Position + checkAOE), summoner, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then local character = parts[i].Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if character ~= alien and humanoid ~= nil and torso ~= nil and humanoid.Health > 0 then targetEnemyTorso = torso targetEnemyHumanoid = humanoid end end end wait(1.0) end
local screamSound = script:FindFirstChild("Scream") if screamSound then screamSound:Play() end
alien.Parent = game.Workspace alien:MoveTo(Egg.Position)
if Egg then Egg.Transparency = 1.0 end
function bite(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.ClassName == "Hat" and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) end end end
alienTorso.Touched:connect(bite)
local duration = 20.0
while duration > 0 and targetEnemyHumanoid.Health > 0 and alienHumanoid and alienTorso do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(alienTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, -2, 0), alienTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0), nil) if ray then alienHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso then alienHumanoid:MoveTo(targetEnemyTorso.Position, targetEnemyTorso) end duration = duration - wait(0.1) wait(0.1) end
wait(2.0)
if alien then alien:Remove() end if Egg then Egg:Remove() end
